name: Bubble Bird 2018
description:
Hey! It’s Bubble time Now！

Bubble Bird 2018 is the very game for bubble blasting lovers. Totally Free to Play and have Fun!

Aim and match color bubbles will create bulk drop to a great relaxing in daily life. Also, help the puppy shoot bubbles will free those trapped poor little birdies!

Don't forget to use super bubble boosters and create combos to win even higher score! Free gold coins from daily tasks, Lucky Spin and watching videos as well as super items are available all day!

Connect to your Facebook account, so you could start the adventure now and advance with your friends together in the fun journey！

Serious Warning:
Try not to be too hooked as to refuse dropping your phone :)

Highlighted Features
- More than 500 Free Levels and more to come – well designed tasks with unique challenges and puzzles!
- Very Easy to Pick up – but hard to master! Score 3 stars on every level to become the champion!
- Amazing Bonus – score by dropping large bunches of bubbles to win huge bonus!
- Powerful Boosters – assist you to pass the challenging levels!
- Dazzling Style – delicate maps & very elating special effects!
